SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.BATCH_RESULT_ID, A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID, A.BATCH_OPERT_ID, B.BATCH_OPERT_NM, B.BATCH_PROGRM, A.PARAMTR, A.STTUS, C.CODE_NM STTUS_NM, A.ERROR_INFO, A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, A.EXECUT_END_TM, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBATCHRESULT A, COMTNBATCHOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID AND A.STTUS = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM076'
A.STTUS = #sttus#
SUBSTR(A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM,1, 8) >= #searchKeywordFrom#
SUBSTR(A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM,1, 8) <= #searchKeywordTo#
B.BATCH_OPERT_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY A.BATCH_RESULT_ID DESC ) TB ) Z WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBATCHRESULT A, COMTNBATCHOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID AND A.STTUS = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM076'
A.STTUS = #sttus#
SUBSTR(A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM,1, 8) >= #searchKeywordFrom#
SUBSTR(A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM,1, 8) <= #searchKeywordTo#
B.BATCH_OPERT_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT A.BATCH_RESULT_ID, A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID, A.BATCH_OPERT_ID, B.BATCH_OPERT_NM, B.BATCH_PROGRM, A.PARAMTR, A.STTUS, C.CODE_NM STTUS_NM, A.ERROR_INFO, A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, A.EXECUT_END_TM, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBATCHRESULT A, COMTNBATCHOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID AND A.STTUS = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM076' AND A.BATCH_RESULT_ID = #batchResultId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNBATCHRESULT ( BATCH_RESULT_ID, BATCH_SCHDUL_ID, BATCH_OPERT_ID, PARAMTR, STTUS, ERROR_INFO, EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, EXECUT_END_TM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #batchResultId#, #batchSchdulId#, #batchOpertId#, #paramtr#, #sttus#, #errorInfo#, #executBeginTime#, #executEndTime#, #lastUpdusrId#, SYSDATETIME, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATETIME )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNBATCHRESULT SET ERROR_INFO = #errorInfo#, STTUS = #sttus#, EXECUT_END_TM = #executEndTime#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE BATCH_RESULT_ID = #batchResultId#
